charges.charge_description: ATTEMPT AND CONSPIRACY TO COMMIT MAIL FRAUD(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant sentenced to 48 months incarceration as to Count 1 and 48 months incarceration as to Count 2 to be served concurrently; 3 years supervised release as to Count 1 and 3 years supervised release as to Count 2 to be served concurrently; $200 special assessment; $33,000 joint and several restitution.
